description:
Chess Pills is a quick-paced chess-puzzle game where you have to guess your best move in a very short time. Fortunately, you have your Magic Pills to aid you.

Features:
- More than 3000 puzzles with randomized order so each run is a different!

- Magic Pills: Orange Pill shows you the piece you need to move, Turquoise Pill freezes time for 10 seconds to help you find a solution.

- Leaderboard: Find out how fast your brain is by checking your position in the Hall of Fame!

- Constant Challenge: puzzles get more difficult as you go on!

- Relax Mode: A less challenging experience with its own leaderboard.

- Local Highscore: Challenge yourself and try to beat your own score!
name: Chess Pills
